intent.goal: Produce clean interior design catalog visuals with a strong call-to-action footer

content.scene_description: A straight-on elevation view of a minimalist kitchen counter featuring walnut cabinets, white countertop, light grey herringbone backsplash, and modern grey range hood.
content.overlay_text: Headline: 'Simplicity Meets Elegance'. Footer: 'Live Light. Live Beautiful'. Button: 'Buy Now'.

text_style.placement: headline overlay on image, CTA in footer
text_style.font_vibe: bold geometric sans-serif headline, clean body
